data.title: Barbara Rush
data.text:
Born: 4-Jan-1927

Birthplace: Denver, CO

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: The Young Philadelphians

Husband: Jeffrey Hunter (actor, m. 1-Dec-1950, div. 29-Mar-1955, one son)

Son: Christopher Hunter (b. 29-Aug-1952)

Husband: Warren Cowan (m. 1959, div. 1970, one daughter)

Daughter: Claudia Cowan (journalist, Fox News)

Golden Globe 1954 for It Came from Outer Space (shared)

TELEVISION

7th Heaven Ruth Camden (1997-)

All My Children Nola Orsini (1992-93)

Flamingo Road Eudora Weldon (1981-82)

The New Dick Van Dyke Show Margot Brighton (1973-74)

Peyton Place Marsha Russell (1968-69)

Saints and Sinners Lizzie Hogan (1962-63)
